EmailTemplate.name: MikePTest2
EmailTemplate.subject: Mike P Test 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom.
Currently, we are unable to continue processing your trademark application. The goods and services listed on your questionnaire appear to include illegal or illicit material ? and per LegalZoom's policy, we will not process such orders.
Because LegalZoom is legally prohibited from giving advice, it is our customers' responsibility to develop a goods and services description that is appropriate for their trademark application*. For more information relating to goods and services as well as International Classifications from the US Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO), please visit {!snippetVariable.tm_gs_manual}
After reviewing this information, please provide us with a detailed list of goods and services. If you choose to cancel at this time, you are eligible for a refund minus any search and processing fees already incurred.
* Members of Business Advantage Pro can receive further guidance from an attorney for no additional cost. If you purchased the Complete Coverage package, you can take advantage of your 30-day trial by simply signing into your LegalZoom Account at www.legalzoom.com/LZWeb/Welcome/SignIn.aspx, and submitting a request through the Member Center link. If you are not a Business Advantage Pro member and would like more information on this affordable service, please visit www.legalzoom.com/attorneys-lawyers/business-advantage-pro.html or call Customer Care at (877) 657-8787. Please note that Business Advantage Pro is not available in all states.
{!snippetVariable.ip_gs_closing}
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
